data.message: This is probably the closest I've seen eminem smile(a little bit) in a long time. He makes me happy already, but seeing him smile is like a miracle. I feel light all of a sudden and all this happiness rush in and it makes me happy to see this dude smile! :)

replies.message: Lol you talk like you know him,  you don't know how much he smiles, and what you do see is scripted or fake majority of the time

Bruh, listen to LP2 
He explains how relieved he is.. Why would he write about being happy and not be happy?
"Don't ever try to judge me dude..." The man probably smiles all the time. You don't know him. Although he wrote his life in all his songs, nobody knows that man..

look I know he smiles, just not on camera. I don't think there's a lot of times where he smiles or laughs on camera. He would hide it or keep a straight face all the way through. I have seen him smile plenty, I'm just that I, myself, haven't seen him smile on camera in a while. Idk why you guys think I know him on a personal level.
Apperenty you haven't seen the bloopers from the movie "Funny People".
You need to get a life!
Are you going to play with urself..?
Nathan Tuong I know what u mean bro. Its cuz you feel a connection to his music, seeing him smile after all the shit you know he's gone through gives you hope. He's your idol man mine too!
It's kind of something like that, but I do enjoy seeing him smile and having a good time on screen. Thanks Joey!
He always smiles behind the scenes or when he does his funny freestyles
Nathan is your real name Stan?! "But in the car they found a tape but they didn't say who it was to, come to think about it...his name was...it was you...damn"

Damn Donald  you're good😆 even tho you're trying to fire at me, I gotta say I liked it lol! I don't have a lot of negativity right now to be hating man! I'm too happy right now, but I wish you a great day and take care man! Spread the positivity!
I know what you're sayin Nathan, idk why all these people are hating, too much negativity

For a person that lives around the corner from his dresden home...he didn't smile as much without being on drugs.  But ever since he got sober he been  happy to put his life back together and doing what he loves to do.
Fuckin haters these days. Just suck a dick and stroke your own ignorant egotistical knowledge. Fucking tools

Eminem  = The prince of my dreams ♡ : behind the scenes, original clip full HD from A -> Z Awesome , love you much ♡ :3 https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=Tr-S9v2tvvA&list=PLJK5abQbgjHuyNx1UIigcNCmhul9lnqQy&index=
